name: greengrass-deployer
description: The function deploys the Greengrass group and restarting connections.

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules dist coverage package-lock.json yarn.lock
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn install && yarn compile
scripts.package: yarn build && yarn copy-modules && cd dist && zip -q -r9 package.zip * -x '**/test/*' && cd ..

author: AWS Solutions Builders
